keyPolicies.policyDescription: Introduce free TV licenses for over 75s, free bus passes, winter fuel payments, and free personal care for older people.
Build more council and social houses, increase council housing stock, and introduce planning law changes to favor local needs.
Improve facilities for children and young people in East Lothian and campaign to save local youth services.
Improve local public transport services, including bus services and rail connections.
Campaign against cuts to vital local services and ensure vulnerable families are supported.

issues.brexitEurope: Oppose an Independence Referendum and No-Deal Brexit
issues.transport: Better Local Transport: improve local public transport services, including bus services and rail connections.
issues.socialWelfare: Fight Welfare Cuts: campaign against cuts to vital local services and ensure vulnerable families are supported.

community.content: Homes for Local People: build more council and social houses, increase council housing stock, and introduce planning law changes to favor local needs.

endorsements.endorsement: Martin has been an accessible, engaging and inclusive representative for East Lothian. His tireless work is to be commended.
Martin has stood as a strong voice for his people. He campaigned on mental health, disabled people’s rights and fairer social benefits.

images.caption: Martin Whitfield, Labour candidate for East Lothian
